title: Workflow ‚Äì Bedrock ‚Üí Lambda ‚Üí API ‚Üí GitHub Actions ‚Üí Blog
text:
Aqu√≠ puedes ver el pipeline completo que genera y publica el contenido autom√°ticamente.





Arquitectura del Workflow



name: Auto Publish DevOps Post

on:
  schedule:
    - cron: "0 14 * * 1,3,5" # Lunes-Mi√©rcoles-Viernes a las 14 UTC
  workflow_dispatch: # correr manualmente

jobs:
  autopost:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout Repo
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Install Quarto
        uses: quarto-dev/quarto-actions/setup@v2

      - name: Call AWS API (Bedrock Lambda)
        id: callapi
        run: |
          RESPONSE=$(curl --silent --show-error \
            --retry 5 \
            --retry-delay 3 \
            --retry-all-errors \
            "${{ secrets.BEDROCK_API_URL }}")

          if [ -z "$RESPONSE" ]; then
            echo "‚ùå Empty response from API"
            exit 1
          fi
          echo "api_response=$RESPONSE" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT

      - name: Parse API Response
        id: parse
        run: |
          JSON='${{ steps.callapi.outputs.api_response }}'

          TITLE=$(echo "$JSON" | jq -r '.title')
          CONTENT=$(echo "$JSON" | jq -r '.linkedin_post')
          DATE=$(date +'%Y-%m-%d')

          FILE="posts/${DATE}-linkedin-auto.qmd"

          echo "---" > $FILE
          echo "title: \"$TITLE\"" >> $FILE
          echo "date: \"$DATE\"" >> $FILE
          echo "categories: [AWS, DevOps, Automation, AI]" >> $FILE
          echo "---" >> $FILE
          echo "" >> $FILE
          echo "$CONTENT" >> $FILE
          echo "" >> $FILE
          echo "_Este post fue generado autom√°ticamente usando AWS Lambda + Amazon Bedrock + GitHub Actions._" >> $FILE

          echo "file_path=$FILE" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT

      - name: Render Quarto Website
        run: |
          quarto render

      - name: Commit and Push Changes
        uses: stefanzweifel/git-auto-commit-action@v5
        with:
          commit_message: "üìù Auto-generated LinkedIn Post for ${{ steps.parse.outputs.file_path }}"
          file_pattern: |
            posts/*.qmd
            docs/**/*.*




GitHub Actions ejecuta un job diario.
El job llama a tu API:

API Gateway ‚Üí Lambda ‚Üí Bedrock.

Bedrock genera un post t√©cnico DevOps.
GitHub Actions crea un archivo .qmd.
El sitio Quarto se vuelve a renderizar.
GitHub Pages publica autom√°ticamente.

jobs:

      - name: Parse API Response
